author: nicolaken
msg: Logkit factory that extends the Cocoon one, but injects a different context root, so that the log files are sent to the project build dir when called from commandline or with the embedded servlet engine.

author: nicolaken
msg: Factor out the resolution of the home dirs and the skin aliasing, to keep them in a single place and make them usable in other classes.

author: crossley
msg: Add meta information to head for generator, skin name, generation date.
